title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7419.2 - Showers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7419.2 - Showers

State Regulations

Every OCFS secure facility shall provide a shower schedule
that allows for the daily shower of each resident. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7419.2

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter III
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
